channel.title: Projects on Eorus
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Eorus

item.title: AGS Soğutma
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Full Stack Development with Content and Photo Creation
  • Client: AGS Soğutma
  • Project date: 01 June, 2016
  • Project URL: www.agssogutma.com.tr

AGS Soğutma Project Details

For AGS Soğutma, I've made the server setup, Wordpress and database installations as back-end development. As part of front-end development, I implemented a work on Skel framework that generally match the brownish colors suitable for the corporate look.

item.title: Arzu Odabaşı
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: One Page Template Setup
  • Client: Arzu Odabaşı
  • Project date: 01 September, 2018
  • Project URL: www.arzuodabasi.com

Arzu Odabaşı Project Details

This is a personal site for Arzu Odabaşı. She is President & Founder of H2A H2A Corporate Management Advisory Company. I've made the server setup as back-end development. As part of front-end, I implemented a one page resume template.

item.title: Daily Camera News
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Camera Industry - Blogging
  • Client: Daily Camera News
  • Project date: 01 January, 2013
  • Project URL: www.dailycameranews.com

Daily Camera News Details

A blog that actively brings together daily camera news with the end user since the beginning of the 2010s. This website, which has English content, appeals to an intense audience together with social media channels. I have been carrying out the entire management individually for about 8 years.

item.title: Darüşşafaka Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Center
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Front End Development
  • Client: Darüşşafaka Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Center
  • Project date: 01 July, 2020
  • Project URL: www.dsftr.com

Darüşşafaka Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Center Project Details

For Darüşşafaka Ömran and Yahya Hamuluoğlu Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Center, I've made the general Wordpress setup with multilanguage support as back-end development. As part of front-end development, I implemented a work on Bootstrap framework that is suitable for the corporate look.

item.title: DSMUN
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Wordpress Theme Integration
  • Client: Darüşşafaka MUN
  • Project date: 01 November, 2017
  • Project URL: www.dsmun.org

Darüşşafaka MUN Project Details

Sometimes it is enjoyable to help young people and create a long-lasting and active website. In this project, we created a MUN site for Darüşşafaka students, known as Model United Nations, with all schools participating. The students decided on the content and design, which is a small copy of the United Nations, and I did the coding and wordpress integration.

item.title: Emaga

Project information

Emaga Project Details

For Emaga, I've made the server setup, Wordpress and database installations as back-end development. As part of front-end development, I implemented a custom theme with using Bootstrap framework.

item.title: Enlem Balıkçılık
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: İçerik ve Fotoğraf Oluşturma ile Full Stack Development
  • Client: Enlem Balıkçılık
  • Project date: 01 Mayıs, 2020
  • Project URL: www.enlembalikcilik.com

Enlem Balıkçılık

Enlem Balıkçılık için sunucu kurulumu, Wordpress ve veritabanı kurulumlarını back-end geliştirme olarak yaptım. Ön yüz geliştirmenin bir parçası olarak, kurumsal görünüme uygun, genellikle su ve balıkçılık terimleriyle eşleşen bir yapıda Bootstrap framework üzerine bir çalışma uyguladım.

item.title: Facebook Groups
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Facebook Groups
  • Client: Social Media of Blogging Platforms
  • Project date: 01 September, 2013
  • Project URL: www.facebook.com

Facebook Groups Details

I regularly manage the Facebook Groups I create for each camera brand in order to reach the blog content to more masses. In addition to the moderation and regulation of these active groups with a large number of users, I share the news and review contents I produce.

item.title: Fotopedi
item.description:
Project information

  • Category: Photography Website - Blogging
  • Client: Fotopedi
  • Project date: 01 September, 2011
  • Project URL: www.fotopedi.org

Fotopedi Details

Fotopedi, which started its publishing life as "Türk Nikon", has written numerous articles on photography, shooting techniques and how to do it. For the last 5 years, the site has been continuing with the name Fotopedi in order not to stick to a brand and to continue as a photography encyclopedia. I have been carrying out the entire management individually for about 6 years.
